name: In the Matter of Mary P. O'ROURKE

parties: In the Matter of Mary P. O’ROURKE.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 21st day of April, 1999, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board of the Supreme Court of Pennsylvania dated February 19, 1999, the Petition for Reinstatement is granted.
Pursuant to Rule 218(e), Pa.R.D.E., petitioner is directed to pay the expenses incurred by the Board in the investigation and processing of the Petition for Reinstatement.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
730 A.2d 470
In the Matter of Mary P. O’ROURKE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 21, 1999.
